Text:
Thanks CHingChongChang,
All your coursewares (A+, N+ and Security+) are of good value.....

A+ Certification (2006) Course Demo

SCSI

Networking
Wireless
Printers

Why doesn't it include all the topics or subjects like RAM, Printers and other..?

Anyway it's video is great. You see the man with the devices whiles talking.. In other videos, you only see the writings and hear the person talking..
If I am not mistaken there is an E-book included which contains those topics. Glad you enjoyed it by the way.
Thanks for seeding, my computer has been down  for a while and I don't have these files anymore. Thanks for keeping these alive.
